title: WebSked Story
description: A story to be pushed to the Washington Post's WebSked planning tool.

id.description: Immutable ID created in the CMS.

status.description: Contains information about the current status of the story.

publish.description: Denotes which of a number of organization-defined publish statuses the story is currently in.

publishRaw.description: The raw publish status from the CMS.

workflow.description: Denotes which of a number of organization-defined workflow statuses the story is currently in.

workflowRaw.description: The raw workflow status from the CMS.

live.description: Whether or not the story is live on the web.

contentType.description: Content type of the story (eg, article, video, gallery).

dates.description: Various RFC3339-formatted datetimes associated with the story.

created.description: The RFC3339-formatted datetime at which the story was created in the CMS.

updated.description: The RFC3339-formatted datetime at which the story was last updated in the CMS.

planned.description: The RFC3339-formatted datetime at which the reporter expects the story to be ready, or null if this is still unknown. This is only an estimate and can be modified later.

scheduled.description: The RFC3339-formatted datetime at which the story will go live, if one has been determined.

published.description: The RFC3339-formatted datetime at which the story was published on the web.

plans.description: An array of plan paths to which the story belongs.

originatingPlan.description: The plan path from which the story originated.

summary.description: A short summary of the story to be displayed in WebSked.

media.description: Contains information about the various media associated with the story.

images.description: An array of the images associated with this story.

galleries.description: An array of the galleries associated with this story.

videos.description: An array of the videos associated with this story.

graphics.description: An array of the graphics associated with this story.

willHaveImages.description: Whether or not the reporter anticipates that the story will have images.

willHaveGalleries.description: Whether or not the reporter anticipates that the story will have galleries.

willHaveGraphics.description: Whether or not the reporter anticipates that the story will have graphics.

willHaveVideos.description: Whether or not the reporter anticipates that the story will have videos.

creators.description: Various information about the creators and contributors to a story.

html.description: The actual content of the story, in HTML format.

slug.description: A short string by which to easily identify the story.

cms.description: The name of the CMS from which the story originated.

cmsEditURL.description: URL to open the story for editing in the CMS' web client.

planned.description: The anticipated number of words in the story.

analytics.description: Contains various analytics information about the story.

comments.description: Number of comments the story has received.

shares.description: The number of times the story has been shared on various social media networks.

usage.description: Contains information about where and when the story has been used.

startTime.description: Epoch time when the story went live at this location.

endTime.description: Epoch time when the story was removed from this location.

editors.description: Array containing information about each of the story's editors.

custom.description: Organizations can use fields within custom to track data that is not captured in the WebSked data specification, but is relevant to their needs.

mediaObject.description: A generic container for a media object.

contributor.description: A contributor to a story (creator or editor).

name.description: First and last name, as it appears in the byline.

role.description: Creator's position at the news organization.

itemRole.description: Contribution in relation to this piece of content.
